description: A unique identifier for each business transaction.
The name of the individual or entity initiating the transaction.
The name of the individual or entity receiving the transaction.
The country associated with the transaction, often indicating location of sender or receiver.
The three-letter ISO 4217 code for the currency used in the transaction.
The monetary value of the transaction. May contain missing or invalid data represented by '???'.
The specific method used for the payment, such as 'Bank Transfer' or 'Credit Card'.
The current processing status of the transaction, e.g., 'Completed', 'Failed', 'Pending'.
The date and time when the transaction was initiated or recorded.
